entry.em: ..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST /4 AM EST/ FRIDAY

entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
